TopicTitle: This is kerbal space program (must watch!)

Articles.Content: I have been working for the past week on this video and believe I have created a fantastic video. Take a look i'm sure you wont regret it!
Wow loved it. Great job!! Really liked the duna reentry part. Very nice camerawork in general!
Amazing video, your hard work definitely payed off! One of the best cinematic videos that i've come across.
YA awesome great job. wich mod did you use for the parachute?

good job. =) you spent some time i can tell.

yea. what mods were/are you using?

This is amazing! I have absolutely no cue how i'd get to even half of those camera angles .

Coming here i was expecting some kind of 'This is Sparta' reference, but nontheless this video is just awesome! Great job
Great video, It was a bit mod heavy though.
Very good video =^.^=, best cinematic ksp video I have seen so far.
Cracking job, though I would've liked to have seen the kerbal on the rocket scene a little earlier on. The epic music seems to advertise a slightly different game to the inherent goofiness of ksp.
Very nice! Great camera work.
I'm stunned.. is the Chutes having a solid mesh a mod or an addition in .20? If a mod, I WANT it
That duna arrival and landing looked incredible...very well done...
Wow the video is truly amazing! good job
Nice job, it makes me want to play KSP... I'm stupid, I'm already playing KSP.
Beautifully done!

YA awesome great job. wich mod did you use for the parachute?

That is the 3m parachute from the HOME mod pack
I was using KW Rocketry, B9 Aerospace, HOME, ANVIL, JARFR THSS, and some others
Awesome job on the camera work!
Thank you..............I used kerbcam
The parachutes on Duna were from the HOME mod pack
